mapper.select: select course.id, teacher_id, course_name, introduction, presentation_percentage, question_percentage, report_percentage, team_start_time, team_end_time, team_main_course_id, seminar_main_course_id from course, klass_student where course.id = klass_student.course_id and klass_student.student_id = #{studentId}

SELECT c.id, c.teacher_id, c.course_name, c.introduction, c.presentation_percentage, c.question_percentage, c.report_percentage, c.team_start_time, c.team_end_time, c.team_main_course_id, c.seminar_main_course_id, k.id 'kid', k.course_id, k.grade, k.klass_serial, k.klass_time, k.klass_location FROM course c LEFT JOIN klass_student ks ON ks.course_id = c.id LEFT JOIN klass k ON k.course_id = c.id WHERE ks.student_id = #{studentId}

SELECT c.id, c.teacher_id, c.course_name, c.introduction, c.presentation_percentage, c.question_percentage, c.report_percentage, c.report_percentage, c.team_start_time, c.team_end_time, c.team_main_course_id, c.seminar_main_course_id, k.id 'kid', k.course_id, k.grade, k.klass_serial, k.klass_time, k.klass_location FROM course c LEFT JOIN klass k ON k.course_id = c.id WHERE c.id = #{courseId}

SELECT c.id, c.teacher_id, c.course_name, c.introduction, c.presentation_percentage, c.question_percentage, c.report_percentage, c.report_percentage, c.team_start_time, c.team_end_time, c.team_main_course_id, c.seminar_main_course_id, k.id 'kid', k.course_id, k.grade, k.klass_serial, k.klass_time, k.klass_location FROM course c LEFT JOIN klass k ON k.course_id = c.id WHERE c.id = #{courseId} OR c.seminar_main_course_id = #{courseId}

select id, teacher_id, course_name, introduction, presentation_percentage, question_percentage, report_percentage, team_start_time, team_end_time, team_main_course_id, seminar_main_course_id from course where seminar_main_course_id is null and id != #{courseId}

select id, teacher_id, course_name, introduction, presentation_percentage, question_percentage, report_percentage, team_start_time, team_end_time, team_main_course_id, seminar_main_course_id from course where team_main_course_id is null and id != #{courseId}
select course.team_end_time from course left join team on course.id = team.course_id where team.id = #{teamId}

SELECT c.id, c.teacher_id, c.course_name, c.introduction, c.presentation_percentage, c.question_percentage, c.report_percentage, c.report_percentage, c.team_start_time, c.team_end_time, c.team_main_course_id, c.seminar_main_course_id, ts.course_id 'cid', ts.strategy_serial, ts.strategy_name, ts.strategy_id FROM course c LEFT JOIN team_strategy ts ON ts.course_id = c.id WHERE c.id = #{courseId}
